reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress pretty, particularly appreciating its navy color, and say it's comfortable and flattering, with one noting how it shapes the body in a lovely way. The fit receives positive feedback, with one customer mentioning the tie in the back for a more form-fitting look. The material quality and sizing receive mixed reviews - while some find the material nice, others say it's cheap, and while some say it's true to size, others report it's not the right size. The zipper quality is also mixed, with several customers noting it's weak. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect in yellow
items.body: This is a stunning dress. I bought this for our daughter’s senior year photo shoot. The cut and fit were excellent. Best fitting dress and we purchased multiple. True to size and descriptions. The dress is sheer but provided a great layer so that it was not see through. Read more
items.author: Katherine Castro Eardley

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars cutest summer dress
items.body: This dress fit perfect! I’m 5 feet tall, 135 pounds and my bra size is a 34c! The medium fit perfectly! the waist was a little big, but the corset part made it perfect to snatch it! Want to hear a funny story with this dress? I bought this dress for a winery, my fiancé and i were wine tasting with friends for like an hour. i got up to use the restroom and my fiancé tells me it looks like i spilled or sat on red wine on the back of this yellow dress. i go to the restroom and found out i actually got my period while i was sitting trying wine! FML right? i started to freak out and wanted to cut it, tuck it in, SOMETHING. i decided to just wash it in the restroom with hand foam soap and water and it literally came out so easily!!! i know this story is unnecessary, but if you find yourself in this situation…. at least you’ll know any stain on this dress comes off with foam hand soap and water… LOL Read more
items.author: destiny ashley

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Flowy floral dress
items.body: Loved the dress, true to size also very flattering on the curves. The only con I would say would be the bust part it’s a little small when it comes to accommodating a bigger bust size. Read more
items.author: katherine

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Completely wrong dress??
items.body: I ordered this dress before in the white with blue florals color, and it was perfect! I love the dress, it’s super cute. But I just ordered it again in the green color and it showed up a completely different dress. It’s super short, barely past my butt, and it has lace all over it where the one I ordered did not. It was also not the right size? I’m not sure what happened with this recent order but I would be cautious purchasing from this store. You may not get what you ordered! Read more
items.author: Lisa Teuscher

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and affordable
items.body: Very comfortable and cute. Fits true to size. Has a liner that goes to just above the knee, below knee the dress is pretty sheer. Wore it for my engagement party that was followed by a photo shoot. The dress looked amazing in the photos. It does wrinkle pretty easy. Great quality for the price. Read more
items.author: erika merrill

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute idea, cheap execution. Fair price?
items.body: The material isn’t thick at all. The zipper quality is fine. The comfort was iffy for me, but I’m 5’9 and 170 pounds. I had to adjust it to the max and even then it was a little tight. I think the value for money is a little off. It should be cheaper for the equality. The dress was flattering. I returned the dress because the double fabric on the bottom didn’t go well together at all. The under skirt was shorter than the outer skirt and it was very visible. Also, surprisingly, there was a slit in the dress. (I didn’t expect it) if I didn’t return the dress, I would’ve sewn it together because it didn’t really match the vibe of the top. The length was mid shin for me. Read more
items.author: Alanna Schaat

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful nice quality dress...love it!
items.body: The dress is beautiful...love the color, material and fit. It is not see through and does not wrinkle. Great value for the money! Read more
items.author: Lisa C.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute dress
items.body: Used this dress for my husband’s reenlistment and I loved the fit! The fabric is light and the style was perfect for the weather. Read more
items.author: Cameron Rodriguez

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: White Red, Blue, Dark Pink, Grey Floral, Pink Purple, Black, Light Yellow, Navy Blue, Red, Pink Red, Pink Rose, White Rose, White, Purple. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
